startups.name: OpenAI
startups.comment: OpenAI founded with a mission to advance AI research

startups.name: AbacusAI
startups.comment: AbacusAI founded to simplify AI for enterprises

startups.name: Glean
startups.comment: Glean founded to enhance enterprise search with AI

startups.name: Anthropic
startups.comment: Anthropic founded by ex-OpenAI researchers to focus on safe AI

startups.name: Perplexity AI
startups.comment: Perplexity AI founded to revolutionize search with AI

startups.name: ElevenLabs
startups.comment: ElevenLabs founded to innovate in AI voice generation

startups.name: xAI
startups.comment: xAI founded by Elon Musk to accelerate human scientific discovery

startups.name: Mistral AI
startups.comment: Mistral AI founded in France to compete in the global AI race
